summary: Tesla is a public company based in the United States that is dedicated to accelerating the world's transition to sustainable energy. It produces electric vehicles and clean energy/storage products in pursuit of its mission. Tesla has grown rapidly since its founding in 2003, and is now operating with over 10,000 employees. It is dedicated to innovation and customer satisfaction, aiming to make the best cars, period, and reduce their environmental impact.
